description: Chile Santiago is a 25-year-old male CountryHuman with striking features including red skin, a snake-like tail and tongue, and unusual eye coloration. He's outgoing and friendly but can be cold and reserved.  He has a strong sense of justice, is artistic and efficient, but also arrogant and eccentric.  He lives with Germany and is openly gay, having had numerous sexual experiences, including one incestuous encounter he regrets.
